definition: A type of clothing item typically worn on the upper body, often made of knitted fabric and designed to be pulled over the head. It is commonly used to keep warm in colder weather and can be worn by individuals of any gender.

examples.german: Wo hast du den Pullover gekauft?
examples.english: Where did you buy the sweater?

examples.german: Ich habe einen warmen Pullover f√ºr den Winter.
examples.english: I have a warm sweater for the winter.
